messages.subject: Re: deschooling reading
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the suggestions everyone!  I have order several books but it take s a while for them to get to me and HEM as well.  I should have more resources
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for all the suggestions everyone! I have order several books
but it take s a while for them to get to me and HEM as well. I
should have more resources by the time I get all of my materials.
Michlle



--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Betsy <ecsamhill@e...> wrote:
> **I need some good reading material for my husband so that he may
> better understand what and why we are doing (deschooling right
> now). He does much better when left to read and find out for
> himself...hmm.**
>
> People were saying that there are two great deschooling articles
in the
> current issue of HEM, Home Education Magazine.
>
> I don't know off of the top of my head if you can order a single
issue
> when it's the current issue. But I think you can order back
issues.
>
> If we haven't driven Helen off with our tantrums, she can give you
a
> definitive answer.
>
> Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] deschooling reading
messages.msgSnippet: **I need some good reading material for my husband so that he may better understand what and why we are doing (deschooling right now).  He does much better
messages.messageBody:
**I need some good reading material for my husband so that he may
better understand what and why we are doing (deschooling right
now). He does much better when left to read and find out for
himself...hmm.**

People were saying that there are two great deschooling articles in the
current issue of HEM, Home Education Magazine.

I don't know off of the top of my head if you can order a single issue
when it's the current issue. But I think you can order back issues.

If we haven't driven Helen off with our tantrums, she can give you a
definitive answer.

Betsy

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] deschooling reading
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you I will look this up too.  Lisa ... From: TroyBridgetM@aol.com [mailto:TroyBridgetM@aol.com] Sent: Friday, September 20, 2002 5:34 AM To:
messages.messageBody:
Thank you I will look this up too. Lisa

-----Original Message-----
From: TroyBridgetM@... [mailto:TroyBridgetM@...]
Sent: Friday, September 20, 2002 5:34 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] deschooling reading

<PRE>Hello...I am just starting to read more about unschooling...and a
friend just
let me borrow 2 books. One is "the unschooling handbook" by Mary
Griffith
and the 2nd is for Christians, which I am, called "Christian
Unschooling" by
Teri Brown. Hope they help. I haven't even read them yet...but heard
they
are awesome! :-) Bridget

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] deschooling reading
messages.msgSnippet: Hello...I am just starting to read more about unschooling...and a friend just let me borrow 2 books.  One is the unschooling handbook by Mary Griffith
messages.messageBody:
<PRE>Hello...I am just starting to read more about unschooling...and a friend just
let me borrow 2 books. One is "the unschooling handbook" by Mary Griffith
and the 2nd is for Christians, which I am, called "Christian Unschooling" by
Teri Brown. Hope they help. I haven't even read them yet...but heard they
are awesome! :-) Bridget
